original_text: And these are the numbers of them according to the house of their fathers: Of Judah, the captains of thousands; Adnah the chief, and with him mighty men of valour three hundred thousand.
korean_text: 군사의 수효가 그들의 족속대로 이러하니라 유다에 속한 천부장 중에는 아드나가 으뜸이 되어 큰 용사 삼십만 명을 거느렸고

sentences.original_text: And these are the numbers of them
according to the house of their fathers:
Of Judah, the captains of thousands;
and with him mighty men of valour three hundred thousand.
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 용감한 장정 삼십만 명이 있었습니다.
